verbs.description: irs rules for [V: stolen] [ARG1: business property] if you suffer a theft in the course of your business or trade you may be entitled to a tax deduction equal to your loss the theft can be anything from embezzlement to robbery as long the action is illegal and you report it as a crime the lost property can be money equipment supplies or even items owned by an embezzlement internal revenue service irs theft
